media.title: Director Arthur Berthelet reviewing script with feminist writer Mary MacLane, 1918.jpg
media.caption: Published photograph of Director Arthur Berthelet discussing screenplay with Mary MacLane, star and co-writer of the film Men Who Have Made Love to Me released by Essanay Studios in February 1918; image is illustration for article "The Moviesâ€”and Me" by Mary MacLane published in Photoplay (Chicago, Illinois), January 1918 issue, volume 13, number 2, p. 24; screenshot of image captured and cropped for page formatting by Wikipedia contributor Strudjum on March 18, 2022.
